Package com.linkedin.helix.store.file

Class Summary
FileHelixPropertyStore<T>  
FilePropertyStore<T> property store that built upon a file system since file systems usually have sophisticated cache mechanisms there is no need for another cache for file property store NOTES: lastModified timestamp provided by java file io has only second level precision so it is possible that files have been modified without changing its lastModified timestamp the solution is to use a map that caches the files changed in last second and in the next round of refresh, check against this map to figure out whether a file has been changed/created in the last second
